Graphics Designer / Cinematographer Job at Efficacy Development Plc




        
    

        
        Efficacy Development Plc, formerly known as Efficacy Construction Company Limited, is a leading Building Construction Company based in Lagos, Nigeria, with over fifteen years of providing exceptional service in the real estate development and construction sphere. Through its productive journey of over fifteen years, the Company has relentlessly grown to be committed to meeting and satisfying one of the most fundamental desires on the hierarchy of human needs, Shelter. A feat we have achieved through persistent accountability, excellence, reliability, and efficiency since conception.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



In 2001, the business started as Efficacy Engineering, and it has since grown and recorded great success and achievements, as evidenced shown and proven, which has also reflected in its managerial structure and renowned customer-centric culture in alignment with its vision, mission, and core values. Today, the Company comprises highly profitable subdivisions or arms such as Law & Logan Energy and Engineering Company, Metro Agro-Food Processing Ltd, and Leron Concepts Ltd, amongst others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer / Cinematographer

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Direct, shoot and edit photos and videos for promotional content.
	Edit footage in post-production
	Stay updated on design trends in the real estate industry.
	Design and produce high-quality marketing materials, including property brochures, flyers, banners, social media posts, and advertisements.
	Create visually appealing layouts for online and offline advertising campaigns, with a focus on real estate properties.
	Design and maintain the company’s visual identity across digital and print media, ensuring consistency with the brand guidelines.
	Work closely with the marketing team to develop creative concepts for social media, email marketing campaigns, and property showcases.
	Prepare graphics for property listings on websites, social media platforms, and email newsletters.
	Revise and adjust designs based on feedback, ensuring the final product meets the desired objectives and brand standards.
	Keep up-to-date with the latest design trends, software, and techniques to enhance the quality and effectiveness of design work.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
	2-5 years of proven experience as a Graphics Designer & Cinematographer, preferably within the real estate sector.
	Proficiency in design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Canva), etc. and video editing software.
	Proficiency in Camera Operation, Cinematography, Video Production and Lighting skills
	Experience in creating visually compelling content
	Proficiency in video editing software
	Attention to detail and creativity in visual storytelling
	Strong communication and teamwork skills
	Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
	Strong attention to detail with excellent organizational and time management skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively with other team members.
	A good understanding of real estate marketing trends and the ability to create compelling visuals that resonate with potential buyers and investors.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@efficacyconstruction.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Assistant Activation Manager Job at Grand Oak Limited




        
    

        
        Grand Oak Limited is part of a team committed to working together across companies. Only by sharing ideas, technologies and talents can the Group achieve and sustain profitable growth, keeping its Commitment. We believe that following through on promises is the best way to maintain credibility with colleagues, employees and customers, through continuous Improvement.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Activation Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Purpose of Job
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Executes all product activation plans approved, supervises those given to agencies, reporting on effectiveness and doing postmortem on each activation event to deliver brand alignment for all activations being embarked upon by the Prime SBU.


Principal Accountabilities


	Independently plan and activate small brand related events like private parties, weddings, burial ceremonies and so on ensuring Industry standards are maintained in all events execution in accordance with communicated briefs, the event objectives and goals of activation.
	Professionally support and report dutifully (POS/TS) on all activation events using agreed Industry metrics, and strictly within communicated guidelines to ensure effectiveness, timeliness and efficacy in brand communication.
	Identify, plan support and execute own activation events like road shows, trade fairs and other large activation events to sustain and grow the brand marketing efforts at GOL and to maintain consumer interest and eventually market share of the assigned brands
	Deliver aligned merchandising of optimum visibility at every, and any relevant touch point as it refers to assigned events in compliance with company policies and to further promote the GOL brands.
	Offer necessary support (e.g., training) to third party staff and others on cocktail mixology, handling and presentation with brand ambassadors with existing brand guides to enhance brand awareness, patronage and participation.


Job Requirements
Education:


	Minimum requirement: Minimum B.Sc./HND in sales/marketing or any discipline.
	Added advantage: Post graduate or MBA


Experience:


	Minimum requirement: Minimum 2-3 years of cognate experience
	Added Advantage: Self management and independent experience


Key Competency Requirements:


	Strong interpersonal skill
	Strategic thinking and planning
	Writing and presentation skills
	Consumer insight and management skills
	Energetic and goal getter with local language skills
	MS suite proficiency.
